Furniture can be defined as the things in your house that you can move around — you can rearrange the furniture in your living room to make room for a piano, for example. Humans have been building and using some form of furniture for thousands of years. Furniture comes from the Middle French fourniture, "a supply," or "an act of furnishing."

1[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]家具 Furniture consists of large objects such as tables, chairs, or beds that are used in a room for sitting or lying on or for putting things on or in. Each piece of furniture in their home suited the style of the house.他们家里的每件家具都和房子的风格相得益彰。2[PHRASE 短语]被认作当然的人(或事物)；习以为常的人(或事物) If you describe someone or something as part of the furniture, you are suggesting that they have been somewhere such as their place of work for such a long time that it is hard to imagine that place without them.   [v-link PHR]  [HUMOROUS 幽默]  [INFORMAL 非正式]Usage Note :Note that furniture is only ever used as an uncount noun. You cannot say 'a furniture' or 'furnitures'. If you want to refer in general terms to something such as a table, a chair, or a bed, you can say a piece of furniture or an item of furniture.furniture 只能用作不可数名词。不能说 a furniture 或 furnitures。将桌、椅、床等泛称为家具时，可以说 a piece of furniture 或 an item of furniture。

translation: adv.口口相传；广泛流传
examples: (1) The news spread from mouth to mouth.(2) The news spread rapidly from mouth to mouth.(3) His story is told from mouth to mouth.(4) Ms japan: because it passes from mouth to mouth.(5) The news was transmitted from mouth to mouth.(6) The rumor passed from mouth to mouth.
(1) 这消息广为流传。(2) 一传十，十传百，这消息很快就传开了。(3) 他的故事被广泛流传。(4) 日本小姐:因为它从一张嘴里传到另一张嘴里。(5) 这一消息被广泛传播。(6) 谣言不胫而走。

translation: n. 脸；表面；面子；面容；外观；威信vi. 向；朝vt. 面对；面向；承认；抹盖n. (Face)人名；(法)法斯；(意)法切
examples: A cut diamond has many faces.They disappeared from the face of the earth.The clowns pulled funny faces.The sun was shining in our faces.Her face lit up when she saw he was coming.She had a face like thunder.Her exam results were disappointing but she tried to put a brave face on it.He faced the difficulty with courage.He must face up to the fact that he is no longer young.The window faces the street.I turned my chair round to face the fire.The building faces north.
经切割的钻石有很多晶面。他们从地面上消失了。小丑扮出了可笑的鬼脸。太阳光直射在我们脸上。当她看到他走过来的时候，她的脸亮了起来。她满面怒容。她的考试成绩令人失望，但却装出若无其事的样子。他勇敢地面对困难。他应该勇于正视自己不再年轻这一事实。那扇窗子面临街道。我把椅子转过来面向火炉。这栋建筑物朝北。

translation: n. 事实；实际；真相
examples: This is an objective fact no one can deny.Before we make detailed plans, we need some more facts and figures.I can find out the truth of the fact.I think you are withholding the fact from me.This news report is based entirely on fact.The fact remains that we are still two teachers short.
这是谁也无法否认的客观事实。我们需要更多的事实和数据才能制定出详细的计划。我能查出事实的真相。我知道你对我隐瞒了事实真相。这篇新闻报导是完全根据实际情况写成的。实际情况是我们还缺少两名教师。

translation: n. 工厂；制造厂；代理店
examples: I got a job in a textile factory.The company wished to locate its new factory beside the river.The car factory is situated on the edge of the town.He works on the assemblylineat the shoe factory.
我在一家纺织厂找到一份工作。这家公司希望把新工厂建在河边。这座汽车制造厂坐落在该城的边上。他在制鞋厂装配线上工作。

translation: vi. 失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退vt. 不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃n. 不及格n. (Fail)人名；(葡、捷)法伊尔；(法)法伊
examples: We must hang together,or our plan will fail.He never fails to write to his mother every week.He studied hard only to fail in the exam.The water supply failed during the drought.As she is getting older, her sight is beginning to fail.Your performance failed your coach who thought that you could have done better.He wanted to lift the heavy box, but his strength failed him.Words fail me right at the sight of this beautiful scenery.You will fail French unless you work harder.He got a fail in history and passes in other subjects.He calls me every Sunday night without fail.

我们必须齐心协力,否则我们的计划就会失败。他从来没有忘记每周给母亲写信。他这么用功，结果竟然考场失利。在干旱期供水不足随着年纪越来越大,她的视力开始下降。你的表现辜负了教练的期望,他认为你本可以做得更好一些。他是想举起那个沉重的箱子,不过力气不行。面对着如此美景,我找不到词语来表达我的心情了。你要是不再加把劲儿,法语考试就不及格了。他历史考试不及格，其他科目都通过了。他每个星期天的晚上必定会给我打电话。

translation: vi. 落下；变成；来临；减弱n. 下降；秋天；瀑布vt. 砍倒；击倒adj. 秋天的n. (Fall)人名；(法、芬、瑞典)法尔；(英、匈)福尔；(阿拉伯)法勒
examples: The knife fell from his nerveless hand.Apples fall from the tree.The tree fell with a thunderous crash.Jobs used to disappear when the snow fell.Food prices lowered during the fall.I had a fall (from a horse) and broke my arm.The falls upstream are full of salmon.
那把刀从他无力的手中落下。苹果从树上落下。那棵树轰隆一声倒下了。当雪天来临时，就业机会就会消失。秋天食品价格下降了。我（从马上）跌下来把胳膊摔断了。该瀑布上流有许多大麻哈鱼。

translation: adj. 错误的；虚伪的；伪造的adv. 欺诈地
examples: The impostor traveled on a false passport.Lucy had a pair of false eyelashes today.They lulled me into a false sense of security.After several false starts, she became a successful journalist.There is no time for false modesty.He is just playing me false, which never surprises me.
那个伪装者用一本假护照旅行。露西今天戴了一副假睫毛。他们哄骗我，让我产生了一种虚假的安全感。她开始时遇到几次挫折,后来成为能干的记者没时间虚情假意地故作谦虚了。他只是在欺骗我,那一点我从来不感到奇怪。

translation: n. 家庭；亲属；家族；子女；[生]科；语族；[化]族adj. 家庭的；家族的；适合于全家的
examples: There are five people in my family.He was born in a wealthy family.He had to work hard to support his family.All our family came to Grandad's eightieth birthday party.Some families have farmed in this area for hundreds of years.She has a large family on her hands.Give my regards to Mr and Mrs Jones and family.The tiger is a representative of the cat family.These languages belong to the Latin family.English is a branch of the Germanic family of languages.Quarrels are a normal part of family life.She works in the family business.They rented a three-bedroom family home with a pool.
我家里有五口人。他出生在一个富裕的家庭。他不得不努力工作来养家。我们所有的亲属都来参加了祖父八十寿宴。有些家族在该地区务农已达数百年。她有许多子女需要照顾。代我向琼斯夫妇及其子女问好.老虎是猫科动物的典型。这些语言都是属于拉丁语族的。英语是日耳曼语系的一个分支。争吵是家庭生活正常的一部分。她在家族的企业工作。他们租住了一个带有三间卧室和一个游泳池,适合全家人居住的房子。

translation: 姓氏
examples: The family name goes back to Norman times.Lalique was a name of a French artist.
这个家族的姓氏可追溯至诺曼第时代。莱俪曾经是一位法国艺术家的姓氏。

translation: adj. 著名的；极好的，非常令人满意的
examples: New York is famous for its skyscrapers.Oscar Wilde was a famous wit.The parks of this city are famous for their ornate fountains.He is a very famous writer in this country.The famous athlete had no vantage to win the game.
纽约以其摩天大楼著称。奥斯卡·王尔德是个著名的风趣的人。这个城市的公园以其华丽的喷泉而著名。他是这个国家里很有名的作家。那个有名的运动员已经没有优势赢得那场比赛了。

translation: vt. 煽动；刺激；吹拂vi. 成扇形散开；飘动n. 迷；风扇；爱好者n. (Fan)人名；(法、俄)法恩；(柬)方
examples: We have an extractor fan in the kitchen to get rid of the smell of cooking.Please turn the electric fan on.She glanced shyly at him from behind her fan.My boss is a football fan.I'm a secret fan of soap operas on TV.The fan circulates the air in the room.We fanned the fire to make it burn brighter.He fanned the cards in his hand before playing.This incident could fan the flame of rebellion.The soldiers fanned out across the hillside in their search for the man.
我们的厨房里有台排气扇，用来消除油烟。请打开电风扇。她羞怯地从她的扇子后面看了他一眼。我的上司是一位足球迷。我从不声张我是电视连续剧迷。狂热者像空气一样在房间里穿梭。我们把炉火扇得更旺。他出牌前先把纸牌在手里展成扇形。这场事件可能煽动反叛的情绪。士兵们在山腰上成扇形散开，搜索那个男人。

translation: adj. 奇异的；空想的；异想天开的；古怪的；极好的，极出色的；不可思议的；不切实际的n. 古怪的人
examples: We watched a fantastic play yesterday evening.I have a fantastic amount of work to do.My daughter likes to describe her fantastic dreams to me.It is so fantastic that a child of 5 can speak so good English.She has got a lot of fantastic ideas which are impossible to be put into practice.
昨天晚上我们看了一场非常精彩的演出。我有大量的工作要做。我女儿喜欢给我讲她那些奇怪的梦。真难以置信,一个五岁的孩子英语竟然说得这么好。她有一大堆不切实际的想法,这些想法不可能付诸实践。

translation: adv. 很；遥远地；久远地；到很远的距离；到很深的程度adj. 远的；久远的n. 远方n. (Far)人名；(德、西、塞)法尔
examples: The new music teacher lives far away.How far do you make it to the station?I was born in a village not far from Beijing.It happened far back in the past.He often works far into the night.The tortoise was far behind him.This English poem is far too hard to translate.The goods were bid up far beyond their real value.In the concrete, the theory is far from perfect.I don't know how far to rely on him.The work hasn't progressed very far.I saw her on the far side of the road.The far side of the moon is difficult for us to observe.Park at the far end of the parking lot.Who is that on the far left of the photograph?He took his journey into a far country.She sits there gazing at the far, with tears on her face.

新来的音乐教师住得很远。你估计到车站有多远?我出生在离北京不远的村庄里。这事发生在久远的过去。他常常工作到深夜。乌龟还在它后面很远的地方。这首英文诗非常难译。这些货物的价格被炒得远远超过了它们的实际价值。实际上,这一理论远远不够完善。我不知道应该依靠他到什么程度。工作没有多大的进展。我看见她在马路对面。我们很难观察月亮的另一边。在最远的停车位停车。相片上最左边的那个人是谁?他到一个遥远的国家去旅行。她坐着凝视着远方，泪流满面。

translation: vi. 种田，务农；经营农场n. 农场；农家；畜牧场vt. 养殖；耕种；佃出（土地）
examples: We work on the farm.Increasingly, farm land is yielding to property development.Our farm land was adjacent to the river.My friend is farming in Wales.They should farm the land instead of letting it lie waste.
我们在农场工作。地产的发展逐渐占据了农田。我们的农田在河边。我的朋友在威尔士的农场种地。他们应当在这块地里种庄稼, 不要让它荒了。

translation: n. 农夫，农民n. (Farmer)人名；(英)法默；(法)法尔梅；(西)法梅尔
examples: The farmer has a shepherd dog.The farmer was pleased to see his piles of corns on the cob.A farmer must plow the land before planting crops.The farmer paid 3 laborers to gather the crop.The farmer keeps hundreds of pigs on his farm.
农夫有一条牧羊犬。农夫很高兴地看着成堆的玉米。农民在种庄稼前必须犁地。农场主雇佣3名工人收割庄稼。那个农场主在他的农场里养了几百头猪。

translation: adj. 快速的，迅速的；紧的，稳固的adv. 迅速地；紧紧地；彻底地vi. 禁食，斋戒n. 斋戒；绝食n. (Fast)人名；(德、英、俄、芬、捷、瑞典)法斯特
examples: I like fast music.The star was whipped into a fast car and driven off.The post is fast in the ground.He led a fast life.He ran fast enough to catch the thief.Bind the rope fast lest it should come loose.He is living too fast for his health.The boat was stuck fast in the mud.The priest had only water and bread during his three week fast.So the meal that breaks your fast should be healthy and wholesome.They have to fast from dawn to dusk.Before the medical exam, you must fast.
我喜欢节奏快的音乐。那个明星迅速上了一辆汽车疾驶而去。那柱子牢牢地埋在地里.他过着放荡的生活。他跑得飞快，足以抓住那小偷。把绳子绑牢，免得它松脱。他现在的生活过于放荡，于健康不利。那船深深地陷在泥里.牧师在三个星期的斋戒期间只进食水和面包。因此解除禁食的这一餐应该是健康有益的。他们一整天都得禁食。在体检之前，你必须禁食。

translation: adj. 肥的，胖的；油腻的；丰满的n. 脂肪，肥肉vt. 养肥；在…中加入脂肪vi. 长肥n. (Fat)人名；(法、西、塞)法特；(东南亚国家华语)发
examples: If you don't get more exercise, you'll get fat.The tight jumper only accentuated his fat stomach.I was so tightly wedged between two fat women that it was difficult for me to get up and leave the bus.Are there any other fruits that are rich in fat?He can't eat fat.You can drink water without getting fat.Then he began to get rather fat.
如果你不多作运动，就会发胖。那件紧身套头毛衣反更突出了他那肥胖的肚子。我被两个肥胖的女人紧紧地挤在中间，以致于要站起来下公共汽车都很难。还有什么水果含大量脂肪?他不能吃肥肉。喝水是不会使你变胖的。后来他开始变胖。

translation: n. 父亲，爸爸；神父；祖先；前辈vt. 发明，创立；当…的父亲
examples: My father and mother went for a walk.He modeled himself on his father.Father Donovan dropped his eyes.Father Dan entered with a big grin.Our father handed down these customs to us.The king is the father of his country.He has fathered an idea.He has fathered three children.
爸爸妈妈去散步了。他把他的父亲作为自己的楷模。多诺万神父垂下了眼神。神父丹带着灿烂的笑容进来。我们的祖先将这些风俗习惯传给了我们。国王为该国之父。他已经提出了一个想法。他已经三个孩子的父亲。

translation: adj. 特别受喜爱的n. 特别喜爱的人（或物）
examples: It used to be my favourite restaurant but the standard of cooking has fallen off recently.Who is your favourite writer?History is my favourite subject at school.I like all the books on the shelf but this one is my favourite.He is a favourite among his teammates.She's the favourite for the job.This book is a great favourite of mine.
那是我以前最喜欢的饭馆，但近来烹饪水平已大不如前了。谁是你最喜欢的作家？历史是我在学校中最喜爱的学科。我喜欢书架上所有的书，但这本是我最喜欢的。他很受队友的欢迎。她最有希望得到这份工作。这是我最喜欢的一本书。

translation: vt. 传真n. 传真n. (Fax)人名；(英、法)法克斯
examples: We receive a fax of the order this morning.I was on vacation last week and didn't receive your fax.After you think it over, please let me know by fax.Reservations can be made by letter or fax.Could you fax me the latest version?My secretary will fax all my travel plans.
我们今天上午收到一份传真订单。上星期我正在度假，没收到你们的传真。你仔细考虑过之后，请用传真相告。可以来信或传真预订。你可不可以把最新版本传真给我?我的秘书会传真给你我的所有行程。

translation: n. 羽毛vt. 用羽毛装饰vi. 长羽毛n. (Feather)人名；(英)费瑟
examples: Feather is very light, so that we say "as light as a feather".A feather floated down on the wind.The peacock displayed its fine tail feather.Birds of a feather flock together.I am not of that feather.The chick will soon feather out.
羽毛很轻，因此我们说“轻如鸿毛”。一根羽毛随风飘落。那只孔雀展现其美丽的尾部羽毛。物以类聚，人以群分我不是那一种人。这只小鸡很快就要长羽毛了。

translation: n. 二月
examples: The second month of the year is February.They reached Beijing on February 17.
一年的第二个月是二月。他们于二月十七日到达北京。

translation: vt. 喂养；供给；放牧；抚养（家庭等）；靠…为生；送人头（游戏术语）vi. 吃东西；流入饲料；饲养；（动物或婴儿的）一餐
examples: Will you feed my cat for me?What do you feed the poultry on?They feed on plankton, the sea's drifting life.Dor locate flying insects on which they feed.He has to work hard to feed and clothe his family.Birds feed on worms and grains.How many feeds a day does this dog get?They usually feed a moist mash to fowls.There are farm animals you can see and feed here.More grain is going to feed cattle.Why are giraffes the cheapest to feed?
请帮我喂我的猫好吗？你们用什么饲料喂养家禽?它们吃以浮游生物为生。或者找到它们赖以为生的昆虫。他必须努力工作以供给全家吃穿。鸟以虫和谷物为食。这只狗每天吃几顿？他们通常用谷糠煮成的湿饲料喂养家禽。这里可以看到农场小动物，而且可以饲料喂食。更多的谷物被用于饲养家畜。为什么长颈鹿是最容易饲养的？

translation: vt. 感觉；认为；触摸；试探vi. 觉得；摸索n. 感觉；触摸
examples: Can you feel the tension in this room?Take a deep breath, and you will feel relaxed.She felt the child's forehead to see if he was feverish.The sheets feels smooth.I felt it advisable to do nothing.With the light off, we had to feel our way.The room has a nice cosy feel.She loved the feel of the sun on her skin.You can tell it's silk by the feel.
你能觉察出这房间里的紧张气氛吗？深深地吸一口气,那样你会觉得轻松的。她摸孩子的前额去看他是不是发烧了。被单摸上去很光滑。我认为最好什么也别做。灯灭了,我们就只好摸索前进。这房间给人非常温暖舒适的感觉。她喜欢太阳照射在皮肤上的那种感觉。你摸摸就知道是绸缎。

translation: n. 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐adj. 节日的，喜庆的；快乐的
examples: We all wore festival costumes to the ball.The carnival was immersed in a festival atmosphere.We all immersed in the gaiety of the Spring Festival.The Nadam Festival is a traditional occasion for Mongols to get together for a few days of festivity.
我们都穿著节日的盛装去参加舞会。嘉年华沉浸在节日的气氛中。我们都沉浸在春节的欢乐之中。传统地，蒙古国人民在那达慕节要聚集欢宴几天。

translation: adj. 很少的；几乎没有的pron. 很少n. 很少数n. (Few)人名；(英)菲尤
examples: We saw few students there.The sunny intervals we were promised have been few and far between.Very few girls went to school then.Only a few of my friends were informed about it.It's easy to while a few hours away in a museum.My time is precious; I can only give you a few minutes.Few of us have his address.
我们在那儿几乎没看见学生。我们原可望能有几阵晴天，结果却很稀少。那时几乎没有女孩子去上学。这件事只有我的几个朋友知道在博物馆里很容易打发掉几个小时。我的时间很宝贵，我只能见你几分钟。我们中几乎没有人知道他的地址。

translation: n. 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场;字段vi. 担任场外队员adj. 扫描场；田赛的；野生的vt. 把暴晒于场上；使上场n. (Field)人名；(英、法、德、葡)菲尔德
examples: Many farmers are working in the fields.He has become famous in his own field.The crowd cheered as the teams entered the field.When Tom insulted the referee, he responded by ordering him off the field.Children went on a picnic and played in a field.She fielded the ball.England will field a young side in the World Cup.The minister easily fielded all the journalist's awkward questions.Just before sunset the peasants quit laboring in the field.There are small holes in the balk of a field, where crabs and fish accumulate in the rainy season.The plants are grown in a laboratory, then transplanted to a field.The prospectors in the field obtain their information in many ways.

许多农民在田里干活。他在自己的领域里已经出名了。球队入场时观众们为之欢呼。汤姆辱骂裁判员时,裁判员的反应是命令他退出场地。孩子们去野餐,在田野上嬉闹。她把球接住了.英国将派一支青年队参加世界杯。部长轻而易举地一一回答了记者提出的棘手问题。农民们直到日落方结束在田间的劳动。田间的梁木上有小洞口，螃蟹和鱼在雨季的时候会聚集在里面。这些植物是在实验室培育，然后再被移植到野外的。野外的勘探人员有许多办法来获取这些资料。

translation: n. 十五；十五个；十五人组成的橄榄球队adj. 十五的num. 十五
examples: He has fifteen workers in his employ.Fifteen separate republics comprised the Soviet Union.I caught six trout in fifteen minutes.Most students in this class are fifteen.The average age of the boys in this class is fifteen.
他雇佣的工人有十五名。苏联由十五个加盟共和国组成。我在十五分钟内钓到了六条鳟鱼。这个班的大多数孩子都十五岁。本班男生的平均年龄是十五岁。

translation: adj. 第五的；五分之一的n. 第五；五分之一num. 第五
examples: He is the fifth person to ask me the question.Fifth Avenue is a good place for window-shopping.He passed me one fifth of the cake.
他是第五个问我这个问题的人了。第五大道是逛街的好去处。他递给我五分之一个蛋糕。

translation: n. 五十；五十个；编号为50的东西adj. 五十的；五十个的；众多的
examples: He fathered a daughter at the age of fifty.Black smog reduced visibility to about fifty yards.
他五十岁时生下一个女儿。黑色的烟雾使能见度降到大约五十码左右。

translation: vt. 装满，使充满；满足；堵塞；任职vi. 被充满，膨胀n. 满足；填满的量；装填物n. (Fill)人名；(德、俄、匈)菲尔
examples: Please fill the cup with water.Smoke filled the room.Life just gives you time and space, it's up to you to fill it.He is competent enough to fill that position.No more tea,thank you,I've had my fill.
请把这个杯子装满水。屋里尽是烟。生活只给我们时间和空间,我们自己决定如何去填充它。他完全胜任那个职位。谢谢你,不要再添茶了,我已经喝足了。

translation: n. 电影；薄膜；胶卷；轻烟vt. 在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影vi. 摄制电影；生薄膜；变得朦胧
examples: He made a film about Egypt.I'm going to see a film this Sunday.There was a film of grease on the water.He bought two rolls of film for the camera.It took them six weeks to film the documentary.Tears filmed his eyes.Joan ran ahead to film us as we crossed the bridge.The window filmed over with moisture.The fiction story won't film well.
他拍了一部关于埃及的电影。在本星期天,我打算看一场电影。水上有一层油。他给照相机买了两卷胶卷。他们拍摄这部纪录片用了六个星期。泪水模糊了他的眼睛。我们过桥时，琼跑到前面为我们拍照。窗子上覆盖着水汽模糊不清这小说不适于摄制成电影。

translation: adj. 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的n. 决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版
examples: The proposal was presented as final package deal.We are all satisfied with the final result.This is our final offer.The game is now in its final stages.Who has the final say here?The judge's decision is final.The World Cup final is being transmitted live to over fifty countries.Football fever gripped the town when the local team reached the cup final.
那项建议是作为最终的一揽子交易提出来的。我们都对最终的结果感到满意。这是我方的最后报价。这场比赛现在处于最后阶段。这里谁有最后决定权？法官的判决是最终判决。世界杯决赛现在正向五十多个国家现场转播。在当地的足球队打进了优胜杯的决赛圈后，全市掀起一阵足球热。

translation: vt. 查找，找到；发现；认为；感到；获得vi. 裁决n. 发现n. (Find)人名；(丹)芬
examples: We have found oil under the North Sea.I think I'm lost; I can't find the bridge.He tried to find in the list his own name.How do you find your new job?Wherever you travel in Canada, you will find a warm-hearted welcome.He was found guilty and sentenced to condemnation.We find against the defendant and order him to pay costs in the sum of $100.Our new babysitter is a real find.My new secretary is very good; quite a find, in fact.
我们在北海发现了石油。我想我是迷路了，我找不到那座桥了。他试图在名单上找到自己的名字。你认为你的新工作怎么样？不论到加拿大何处旅游,都会感到宾至如归。他被发现有罪，并且被定了罪。我们判定被告有罪，令其支付诉讼费共计100美元。我们新来的临时保姆是难得的好保姆。我的新秘书很好，确实是难得的人才。

translation: adj. 好的；优良的；细小的，精美的；健康的；晴朗的n. 罚款vt. 罚款；澄清adv. 很好地；精巧地n. (Fine)人名；(意)菲内；(英)法恩
examples: She is a fine singer, as her mother used to.She has a remarkably fine voice.We're going to a famous restaurant famous for its fine cuisine.Yesterday's forecast reported it'd be fine.Don't worry. She'll be fine.Sand is finer than gravel.That suits me fine.If we only allow five minutes for catching our train, we'll be cutting it too fine.The judge imposed a fine of ten pounds on him.The driver paid a fifty-dollar fine for speeding.He was fined 200 dollars.The key to fining the structure of ingot casting lies in the formation of a number of fine equiaxed crystal grains.
像她妈妈过去一样,她是个很好的歌手。她嗓音非常好。我们要去一家有名的餐馆,它是以精致的菜肴闻名。不过,昨天的预报说是会放晴的。不要担心,她会好的。沙子比碎石细.这对我很合适。假如我们只留五分钟的时间赶火车，那麽我们卡的时间就太紧了。这个法官让他缴纳10英镑的罚款。司机因超速行驶付了五十元的罚金。他被罚款200美元。金属铸态组织细化的关键是获得大量细小等轴晶。

translation: n. 手指；指针，指状物vt. 伸出；用手指拨弄vi. 用指触摸；拨弄n. (Finger)人名；(英、德、捷)芬格；(俄)芬格尔
examples: The finger of the clock points to twelve.The pen slips out of my fingers.She poked her finger into the hole.She cut her finger on some broken glass.Please don't finger the goods.I don't like eating food that's been fingered by someone else.She fingered the rich silk.
钟的指针指向十二点。钢笔从我指缝中滑下去了。她把手指插入孔中。她被碎玻璃划破了手指。请勿触摸这些物品。我不愿意吃别人摸过的食物。她抚摸着华丽的丝绒。

translation: vt. 完成；结束；用完vi. 结束，终止；终结n. 结束；完美；回味（葡萄酒）
examples: When do you finish your college course?She should finish with him he treats her very badly.I've finished with gambling it's a waste of money.That fever nearly finished him off.I'll finish off this dress in a few minutes; I'm just giving it the last finishing touches.Please put the saucepan away if you've finished with it.He was in at the finish and witnessed the excitement of the fans.You can come with us tonight if you want to be in at the finish.I want to see the job through to the finish.That's a smooth finish on furniture.
你什么时候完成大学课程？她应该和他断绝关系－－他对她太不好了。我已经戒赌了－－赌博完全是浪费钱财。那场热病几乎送了他的命。这件衣服几分钟就可做好了，我已经在收尾了。你用完了那个长柄锅，就把它收起来。比赛结束前他在场,亲眼目睹了球迷们的狂热。如果你想结束时在场，今晚可以和我们一起来。我要看这项工作做完为止。那是家具上的最后一层光漆。

translation: n. 壁炉
examples: She edged her chair nearer to the fireplace.
她把椅子移近壁炉。

translation: n. 烟火（firework的复数形式）；激烈争论
examples: The boys were letting off fireworks.We went to a firework display yesterday.
男孩子在放烟火。我们昨天去看放烟火。

translation: adv. 第一；首先；优先；宁愿n. 第一；开始；冠军adj. 第一的；基本的；最早的num. 第一n. (First)人名；(英)弗斯特；(捷)菲尔斯特
examples: He was the first to be there.He came too late to see the first part of the show.First of all she just smiled, then she started to laugh.No matter it is windy or rainy,he always comes first.What were your first impressions of Beijing?Speech is learnt in the first years of life.The first time I saw seals was in an aquarium.This is my first crack at cooking.
他是第一个到达那里的。他来得太晚了,没赶上看节目的第一部分。最初她只是微笑，後来才放声大笑。不论刮风还是下雨,他总是第一个来。你对北京的最初印象如何？说话是人在一生中最初几年学会的。我第一次看见海豹是在水族馆里。这是我第一次尝试做饭菜。

translation: vi. 捕鱼，钓鱼；用钩捞取n. 鱼，鱼类vt. 钓鱼，捕鱼；搜寻n. (Fish)人名；(英、西)菲什；(俄)菲施
examples: We caught three little fishes.The fish plopped back into the river.There is much fish on the plate.Meat and fish are often kept in cold storage.Pug did believe he hadn't played this particular fish.The beach is a good place to fish from.They stood on the river bank to fish.Have you a permit to fish in the lake?He fished in his pocket for the key.
我们捉到三条小鱼。那鱼扑通一声跃回河中。盘子里有不少鱼肉。鱼肉常存放在冷藏库中。帕格的确相信，他并没玩弄这个大笨蛋。海滩是钓鱼的好地方。他们站在河岸边钓鱼。你有在湖里捕鱼的许可证吗?他搜囗袋想找出钥匙。

translation: vt. 安装；使……适应；使……合身；与……相符vi. 符合，配合；适合；合身adj. 健康的；合适的；恰当的；准备好的n. 合身；发作；痉挛n. (Fit)人名；(捷、罗)菲特
examples: I don't see fit to tell you all my plans.The soil is fit for cotton planting.The room was a fit place for study.He could find a fit opportunity to divulge their marriage.The manager gave her a blank cheque to reorganize the department in any way she thought fit.He is now fit enough to go back to work.His endowments are limited, and scarcely fit him for this post.A plumber is a person who fits and mends the plumbing.Could you fit me up with a new bulb for the headlight of my car ?Can you fit it in the door?She had a fit of hysterics and called him some bad names.A fit of stubbornness came over him and he refused to have anything further to do with them.Humidity caused me another fit of rheumatism.This dress is a beautiful fit.

我认为把所有的计划都告诉你是不适宜的。这种土壤适宜种棉花。这个房间适宜读书。他找到一个合适的机会来宣布他们的婚姻。为了能按照她认为合适的方法去整顿这一部门，经理授予她自由行动的权力。他现在身体健康，可以回去工作了。他的天资有限,不太适合担任这项职务。管子工是安装和修理水管的人。请您给我的车灯安装一个新灯泡好吗?您能把它安装在门上吗?她一阵歇斯底里发作，骂了他几句。他的牛脾气发作了，再不肯和他们打什么交道。湿气使我的风湿病又发作了。这件衣服既合身又漂亮。

translation: n. 五，五个；五美元钞票num. 五，五个adj. 五的；五个的n. (Five)人名；(挪)菲弗

他把架子装在墙上。我的表停了,需要修理了。你们选定结婚日期了吗?给我几分钟时间，我在梳理头发。我确定这场比赛是被操纵的。我们真的处于困境——没人照顾婴儿。他们设法确定了快艇的方位。我敢肯定她的提升有鬼.

translation: vt. 淹没；充满；溢出vi. 涌出；涌进；为水淹没n. 洪水；泛滥；一大批n. (Flood)人名；(英)弗勒德；(瑞典、芬)弗洛德

一下大雨地窖里就灌满了水。河水冲破堤岸,淹没了山谷。办事处收到如洪水般涌至的投诉信件。日本汽车已充斥美国市场。申请书像潮水般涌进办公室。他的崇拜者接连不断地给他写信。她的孩子让洪水给冲走了。暴风雨后的洪水冲毁了这座城镇。洪水毁坏了大量农作物。

父亲让我刷洗一下车库的地面。地面潮湿而光滑。我们把书在地板上堆起来。我们的办公室在一楼。这几个盆地的底部有沙漠、湖泊和沼泽。我们打算用橡木铺地板。由于维克多的戒心松懈，杰克将他击倒在地。当你看到警车时,別开快车。

translation: n. 花；精华；开花植物vi. 成熟，发育；开花；繁荣；旺盛vt. 使开花；用花装饰n. (Flower)人名；(英)弗劳尔
examples: She picked up a pink flower from a foxglove.I dare not touch the flower for its tenderness.The plant has a brilliant purple flower.The flower languished from lack of water.I'll arrange some flowers in a vase.I am going to plant more flowers in the front yard this year.They are the flower of the nation's youth.Men were killed in the flower of theirHe is in the flower of his maturity.Cherry trees flower in the early spring.Their friendship flowered while they were at college.The dog had made in the flower beds.Mint - Goon Daughter florist lovely mellow soul good intelligent thoughtful skill transfer has been the flower decoration.
她从毛地黄上摘了一朵粉花。这花太娇嫩了，我不敢碰它。那棵植物开著一朵鲜艳的紫花。花因缺水而枯萎。我要往花瓶里插些花。今年我打算在前院里多种些开花植物。他们是该国青年的精英。男子在年轻的时候就被杀了。他正处于成熟时期。樱桃树在早春开花。他们的友谊在求学时已根深蒂固。这只狗在用花装饰的床单上拉屎。圆润可爱的女儿花店智能灵魂良好周到的技能转让已花装饰。

translation: vi. 飞；驾驶飞机；飘扬vt. 飞行；飞越；使飘扬n. 飞行；苍蝇；两翼昆虫adj. 敏捷的n. (Fly)人名；(法)弗利；(英)弗莱
examples: The aircraft was flying above thick fog.How time flies!She will drive to, but fly back from, London.Only experienced pilots fly large passenger aircraft.He was warned to fly from the emperor's wrath.We could see the enemy fly before our forces.Each Member shall require all ships that fly its flag to have a copy of this Convention available on board.Some motorcycle taxi drivers proudly fly the star spangled banner in place of the Ugandan flag which normally adorns their wing-mirror.Waiter, there's a fly in my soup! That's OK, Sir, there's no extra charge!I wish I could be a fly on the wall when they discuss my future.The bird caught a bug on the fly.Peter is nothing but a fly on the wheel.

飞机在浓雾上空飞行。时间过得真快！她将坐汽车去伦敦，坐飞机从伦敦回来。只有有经验的飞行员才能驾驶大型客机。他被告知皇帝发怒时离远一点。我们可以看到敌人在我军面前狼狈奔逃。各成员国应要求悬挂其旗帜的所有船舶均携带一份本公约。一些摩的司机骄傲的悬挂美国的星条旗飞驰着，代替了乌干达国旗装饰在后视镜上。服务员,汤里有只苍蝇!我知道,先生,我们没有另收钱。在他们讨论我的前途时，我恨不得能偷偷旁观。那鸟在飞行中捉住了一只昆虫。彼特不过是个妄自尊大的人而已。

translation: n. 雾；烟雾，尘雾；迷惑vt. 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩vi. 被雾笼罩；变模糊n. (Fog)人名；(丹)福
examples: The headlamps penetrated the fog.Fog will persist throughout the night.They used dry ice to fog the stage.A full moon was beginning to rise and peered redly through the upper edges of fog.I was really in a fog after the exam.Steam has fogged the bathroom mirror.Shut the door or the light will fog the film.The government was trying to fog the real issues before the election.
车的前灯的光射进雾中。雾将整夜不散。他们用乾冰于舞台变得一片朦胧。一轮满月开始升起，带着红色的光芒在雾气上沿朦胧出现。考完试后，我真的感到稀里糊涂。水蒸气把浴室里的镜子遮住了。把门关上，不然亮光能使底片发灰。政府企图在选举前混淆实质问题。

translation: adj. 有雾的；模糊的，朦胧的
examples: He left Beijing on a foggy morning.But today, this magic hasn't been strong enough to stride over the straits, in the tractive-lost &foggy street, gadding &gadding.
他在一个有雾的早上离开北京。可是今日，这魔力还没有跨越海峡的坚强，在失去了牵引的有雾的街头，游荡游荡。

translation: vt. 跟随；遵循；追求；密切注意，注视；注意；倾听vi. 跟随；接着n. 跟随；追随

打篮球是体育活动的一种形式。建筑物的形式取决于建筑物的用途。它具有不规则的水渍形状。他正在填写一张表格。我没有这匹马的情况记录。大卫那时竞技状态确实不好。全队经过六个月的训练竞技状态极佳。从他最近的表现来看，他应该很容易考及格。申请科研补助金按常规应该怎么办?一项计划在他脑子中形成。我对此还不能形成什么看法。水渗透石灰石则形成洞穴。他决心成立一个俱乐部。法国和德国同意建立一支联合军队。

她十四岁时就在美国旅游观光。我妹妹差不多十四岁了。

translation: vt. 欺骗；使变酸n. 狐狸；狡猾的人vi. 假装；耍狡猾手段n. (Fox)人名；(英、法、德、意、西、瑞典)福克斯
examples: The fox lay dying in a pool of gore.The fox went to ground under a rocky escarpment.He's a crafty old fox.Don't trust him, he is a sly old fox.The trainee foxed the arrogant instructor with a knotty problem.His meeting with Mr Ma was rescheduled to fox protesters.
狐狸倒在血泊中奄奄一息。狐狸钻进了石崖下面的洞里。他是一只狡猾的老狐狸。别相信他，他像老狐狸一样狡猾。那位受训的队员故意用难题把傲慢的教练搞糊涂。他与马先生的会面被重新安排以迷惑抗议者。

examples: The English Channel divides England from France.We are going to France to spend our holidays.She wrote a memoir of her stay in France.Is France in Europe?Britain's nearest neighbor is France.Paris is the capital of France.
英吉利海峡把英法两国分隔开来。我们将去法国度假。她写了一篇旅法记事录。法国在欧洲吗？英国最近的邻居是法国。巴黎是法国的首都。

translation: adj. 免费的；自由的，不受约束的；[化学] 游离的vt. 使自由，解放；释放adv. 自由地；免费n. (Free)人名；(英)弗里
examples: The prisoners wish to be free again.As a freelancer, he has more free time to himself.This service is free of charge.Is the book for free or for a charge?A free flow of water came from the pipe.The hill is completely free from trees.He is free from any sense of responsibility.Then you need a free and undamaged landing field.He spends all his free time on computer games.Friday afternoons are left free for revision.She is very free in discussing her personal problem.He requested that they free the hostages.Abraham Lincoln freed the slaves.They must free themselves from imperialist control.She is making a desperate bid to free herself from a loveless marriage.Relaxation exercises can free your body of tension.We freed time each week for a project meeting.The government has promised to free up more resources for education.Children under five usually travel free on trains.He made free with all his girl-friend's money.The driver had to be cut free from the wreckage of his car.

囚犯们希望重获自由。因为是个自由职业者,他有更多属于自己的自由时间。该服务是免费的。这本书是免费的,还是收费的?水从管道里通畅地流了出来。这个山丘上一棵树也没有。他丝毫没有责任感。然后你需要一个空闲的未损坏的机场。他所有的空闲时间都花在电子游戏上了。留出星期五下午的时间做复习。她在与人谈论自己的私事时毫无拘束。他请求他们释放人质。亚伯拉罕•林肯解放了奴隶。他们必须使自己摆脱帝国主义控制。她正作出不顾一切的努力去摆脱她那段没有爱情的婚姻。放松运动可以松缓身体的紧张。我们每周都腾出时间开一次项目会议。政府保证调拨更多资源用于教育。五岁以下的儿童乘火车通常免费。他随便花女朋友的钱。破开了汽车残骸才把司机解救出来。

translation: vi. 冻结；冷冻；僵硬vt. 使…冻住；使…结冰n. 冻结；凝固n. (Freeze)人名；(英)弗里兹

Others/Some can speak French.I've only recently started learning French.This student is good at French.The French defeated the English troops.They assumed I was French from my surname.Do you like French films?It 's one of the best French restaurants in Boston.The French paper was set by our form teacher.He knows a few French words.

examples: The mastermind of the expedition was a Frenchman.
这次探险的策划者是一个法国人。

translation: n. 星期五
examples: They reached London on Friday.We will do a Chemistry experiment this Friday.
他们星期五到达伦敦。这个周五我们要做化学试验。

translation: n. 电冰箱n. (Fridge)人名；(英)弗里奇
examples: She can mend the fridge by herself.The butter will soften out of the fridge.
她能自己修理冰箱。黄油从冰箱中取出会变软。

translation: n. 朋友；助手；赞助者n. (Friend)人名；(英)弗兰德
examples: A friend in need is a friend indeed.My friend invited me to dine out.I made friends with Bill in high school.Mr. Green has been a friend of community charity.He has been a good friend to me.The death of his friend made him sad at heart.A joke never gains an enemy but loses a friend.Every man desiring to be a friend of this world makes himself a hater of God.
患难之交才是真朋友。我的朋友邀请我出去吃饭。我和比尔在高中就成为朋友。格林先生一直是社区慈善事业的支持者。他一向是我的赞助者。友人之死使他十分伤心。戏谑不能化敌为友，只能使人失去朋友。所以凡想要与世俗为友的，就是与神为敌了。

translation: adj. 友好的；亲切的；支持的；融洽的，和睦的adv. 友善地；温和地n. (Friendly)人名；(英)弗兰德利
examples: The meeting is gone on in very friendly atmosphere.He cloaked his evil purpose under friendly words.He was not very friendly to us.Our neighbourhood police are very friendly.Let's keep the conversation on a friendly plane.He talks to his students in a friendly way.
会议在非常友好的气氛中进行。他用友好的语言来掩盖他罪恶的目的。他对我们不太友善。我们邻近的警察非常友善。让我们友好地谈话。他和他的学生友好地交谈。

translation: n. 友谊；友爱；友善n. (Friendship)人名；(英)弗兰德希普
examples: Take this ring as a pledge of our friendship.Real friendship is more valuable than money.He swore eternal friendship with me.He rebuffed all my offers of friendship.
请接受这个戒指作为我们友谊的信物。真正的友谊比金钱更宝贵。他发誓和我永远友好。他拒绝了我的一切友好表示。

translation: vt. 使惊吓；吓唬…vi. 害怕，惊恐
examples: It is illegal to frighten a pigeon.They tried to frighten the public into obedience.He frightened the old man into giving him all the money.You frighten me, even though you're gentle with me.The little baby was frightened by the fierce dog.You'll find that I don't frighten easily.
惊吓鸽子是违法的。他们企图吓唬群众使他们屈服。他恐吓那位老人把所有的钱都给了他。你使我害怕,尽管你对我很温柔。那个小孩被恶狗吓坏了。你会发现我不是轻易就会害怕的。

translation: n. 前面；正面；前线vt. 面对；朝向；对付vi. 朝向adj. 前面的；正面的adv. 在前面；向前n. (Front)人名；(法)弗龙
examples: The front of the postcard shows a picture of our hotel.Put the statue so that the front faces the light.The front of the building was covered with ivy.The car in front of me stopped suddenly and I had to brake.That morning we received a report from the front.This building fronts the railway station.Attractive gardens fronted the houses.We may argue among ourselves, but against the management we must present a united front.Well aware of the danger he was in, the guerrilla put up a bold front and kept a stiff upper lip.The hotels front onto the sea.Someone else will front for him in court.The man sitting in front of me is asleep.Can you see a red car in front of that house?

明信片正面是我们旅馆的图片。把雕像摆好，让正面向著光。建筑物的前面爬满了常春藤。我前面那辆小汽车突然停住，我只好刹车。那天早上,我们收到了从前线送来的一份报告。这栋建筑面朝火车站。这些房子的前面都有漂亮的花园我们内部不妨有争论，但对付资方我们必须团结一致。明知自己处境危险，但这个游击队员勇敢对付，顽强不屈。这些宾馆都是面朝大海。别人将为他在法庭上辩护。坐在我前面的人在睡觉。你能看到那所房子前面的一辆红色汽车吗？

translation: n. 水果；产物vi. 结果实vt. 使……结果实n. (Fruit)人名；(法)弗吕；(英)弗鲁特
examples: The bough was loaded with fruit.The flower becomes fruit when it worships.Their research project haven' t borne fruit.The book is the fruit of years of research.An apple is a kind of fruit.Several baskets of fruit were eaten at the party.The apple trees are fruiting early this year.
树枝上果实累累。花崇拜时便成了果实。他们的研究课题还未取得成果。这本书是多年研究的成果。苹果是一种水果。宴会上，大家吃掉了好几篮水果。今年苹果树很早结果。

translation: adj. 完全的，完整的；满的，充满的；丰富的；完美的；丰满的；详尽的adv. 十分，非常；完全地；整整vt. 把衣服缝得宽大n. 全部；完整
examples: Hotels are often full in seasonHe gave a boring speech full of stale jokes.The bottle is full of water.The roses are in full bloom.Sign your name in full.The moon can't always be at the full.They knew full well that he wouldn't keep his promise.Henry hit him full in the face.
在度假旺季,旅馆经常客满。他的发言很乏味,满是陈腐的笑话。瓶子里装满了水。玫瑰花盛开了。签下你的全名。月亮并不总是都是圆的。他们很清楚地知道他不会遵守诺言。亨利一下正打在他的脸上。

translation: n. 乐趣；玩笑；有趣的人或事adj. 供娱乐用的vi. 开玩笑
examples: I'm learning to cook, just for the fun of it.You'll sure to have fun at the party tonight.People make fun of her because she always speaks foolishly.Laugh is an expression of happiness, joy, silliness or fun.Swimming in the sea is great fun.
我正在学做饭，做著玩儿而已。你在今晚的晚会上一定会玩得很开心。人们嘲笑她，因为她常说傻话。笑是用来表达幸福,喜悦,可笑或玩笑等的表情!在海里游泳很好玩。

translation: adj. 有趣的，好笑的，滑稽的；（口）稀奇的，古怪的，奇异的；有病的，不舒服的；狡猾的，欺骗（性）的，可疑的，不光明n. 滑稽人物；笑话，有趣的故事；滑稽连环漫画栏；（英）（比赛用）单人双桨小艇
examples: The story was very funny.He closed his speech with a funny joke.Her hair was done up in a very funny way.My funny drawings amused the children.A funny thing happened to me today.He won't stand for any funny business here.
这个故事非常可笑。他用一则有趣的笑话结束了演讲。她的头发非常滑稽地盘在头上。我的滑稽的图画把孩子们给逗乐了。今天我遇见个莫名其妙的事。他不准有任何不道德的事在这里发生。

translation: n. 未来；前途；期货；将来时adj. 将来的，未来的
examples: Take no thought for your future needs.Do you really care nothing about your future?He felt at ease and confident about the future.We will meet in Beijing in the near future.I wish you a very happy future.I gave up my job because there was no future in it.There are many cases where transactions involving foreign exchange are not confined to the immediate future.
不必为将来的需要而操心。你真的一点也不关心你的将来？他对未来感到轻松自在并且充满信心。在不久的将来，我们将在北京见面。我祝你有非常幸福的未来。我的工作没有前途,所以我不干了。有许多涉及外汇的交易都不限于近期期货。

translation: 面对面
examples: They are standing there, face to face.His ambition was to meet his favourite pop star face to face.
他们面对面地站在那里。他心向往之的是要面对面地见见他心目中的流行曲歌星。

translation: v. 入睡；睡着
examples: I tossed about all night, unable to fall asleep.It took him a long time to fall asleep last night.He soon fell asleep and began to snore.Because I am tired, I fall asleep quickly.
我彻夜辗转反侧，无法入睡。昨晚他过了好一会儿才入睡。他很快睡着并开始打起鼾来。因为我很疲劳，因此很快就睡着了。

translation: 生病；病倒
examples: She had to stay home because her son fell ill.She is ill now and turns away from her food.
因为儿子生病所以她得待在家里。她现在正生病，不想吃什么东西。

translation: 遥远的
examples: He descried an island far away on the horizon.He took his journey into a far country.
他看到遥远的地平线上有个岛屿。他到一个遥远的国家去旅行。

translation: adv. 远离；远非；完全不
examples: The scene is laid in a village far from the city.She lives in seclusion apart from her friend.His explanation was far from satisfactory.This way of shifting the blame onto others is far from clever.
故事发生在远离城市的一个小村庄里。她远离朋友，过隐居生活。他的解释一点也不令人满意。这种把错误推给别人的作法是一点也不聪明的。

translation: 想要做…
examples: What do you feel like doing?She was so depressed she felt like doing herself in.What do you feel like doing today?
你想做什么?她心灰意冷想要自杀。你今天想做什么?

translation: 解决；算出；想出；理解；断定
examples: The boy can't figure out the algebra problems.It didn't take the children long to figure out the correct answer.I can't figure out why he is absent.I can't figure out why he quit his job.He's trying to figure out a way to solve the problem.
这个男孩做不出这道代数题。孩子们没有花很多时间就算出了正确的答案。我弄不明白他为什么缺席。我琢磨不透他为什么要辞掉工作。他正在努力想办法解决这个问题。

translation: 装满，充满
examples: The royal palace was filled with intrigue.My room is filled with the odor of roses.The hall was filled with choking clouds of smoke.I am filled with desire to go back home.
皇宫中充满了勾心斗角。我的房间里充满了玫瑰花的香味。大厅里充满了使人窒息的烟雾。我心中充满了回家的渴望。

translation: 填写；填充；替代
examples: Please fill in your jurisdictional district.Fill up the order blank now,pencils will do.
请填写你的管辖区。请迅即填写订货单，用铅笔也可以。

translation: v. 找出，查明；发现，揭发
examples: We must find out the truth of this incident.
我们一定要把这件事情的本相找出来。

translation: adv. 首先
examples: Athletes should first have the sense of fair play.I must finish my homework first.
运动员首先要有公平竞争的意识。我必须首先做完家庭作业。

translation: 永远；总是
examples: It was a cancer for permanency and pain.He has disappeared for ever since then.
那简直是一颗永远折磨人的毒瘤。从那以后，他就永远地失踪了。

translation: 例如
examples: For example, London is the capital of Britain.Editing files with Finder, for example, is OK.
例如，伦敦是英国的首都。编辑文件的搜索，例如，是，确定。

translation: 永久地；一劳永逸地
examples: He had smoked for so many years that his teeth were permanently stained yellow.In the increased vibration, the quickening of movement of the molecular structure allows for the records to be reviewed and then released and erased for good.
他吸了那么多年烟，牙齿都被永久地熏黄了。在振动的增加中，细胞结构活泼的运作容许记录被检查，而随后被永久地释放与抹除。

translation: 从现在开始
examples: From now on, I will begin to write my book.It's due to arrive an hour from now.Don't play with the Zhangs from now on.Please fill me in on your future plan.
从现在起，我将开始写我的书了。从现在起一个小时就该到了。今后不要和张家的孩子玩。请详细谈谈你今后的打算。

translation: 从那时起
examples: His career blossomed from then on.They have been good friends since then.
从那时起他的事业兴旺起来。从那时起他们就一直是好朋友。

translation: 不时，有时
examples: Sometimes it is necessary to trim those policies.The temper gets the best of him from time to time.From time to time, I looked up from my notebook.He is planning to amass a fortune for a rainy day.
有时需要改变原先制定的那些政策。他有时控制不住自己的脾气。我的目光不时地离开习字纸向上看。他正打算积蓄财富以备不时之需。
